subject: Re: CROS P discontinuation - removal of DMC items

full_threads.body:
Hi Melinda, 

Great, thanks for confirming. Please note that any further updates to the live site will need to be done on the staging server as well.

Hi Chris,

Thanks for the updates, these look fine

Thanks

Melinda

Hi Melinda, 

Confirming the CROS P updates have been completed on both the live and staging server, you can see the changes below: 
https://stg-phonakmarketing-stg.kinsta.cloud/cros-p-marketing-catalogue
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/cros-p-marketing-catalogue/

Please review the updates and let us know of any changes.

Hi @glen, all looks great on


We just need to replicate the updates on: https://stg-phonakmarketing-stg.kinsta.cloud/cros-p-marketing-catalogue/

done updating the page. please check.
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/cros-p-marketing-catalogue

30mins
@glen, can you please action the below? Thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris & Heath,

Hope you both enjoyed a relaxing long weekend!

Can you please remove the following items from the Paradise tile, CROS P, as CROS P-R has been phased out from 31st March.

https://phonakmarketing.com.au/cros-p-marketing-catalogue/















There should only be the following items remaining on the DMC portal for CROS P.

Factsheets x 3
Datasheet x1 (CROS P P-13)

Thanks,

Mel.



Melinda O'Brien
Phonak Marketing Manager
